member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify the data type of a parameter to a meta command.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE_FLOAT
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is of type FLOAT.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE_UINT64
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is of type UINT64.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE_GPU_VIRTUAL_ADDRESS
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a GPU virtual address.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE_CPU_DESCRIPTOR_HANDLE_HEAP_TYPE_CBV_SRV_UAV
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a CPU descriptor handle to a heap containing either constant buffer views, shader resource views, or unordered access views.

member.name: D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE.D3D12_META_COMMAND_PARAMETER_TYPE_GPU_DESCRIPTOR_HANDLE_HEAP_TYPE_CBV_SRV_UAV
member.summary: Specifies that the parameter is a GPU descriptor handle to a heap containing either constant buffer views, shader resource views, or unordered access views.
